sentences.en: "Do you play chess?" he asked, looking askance at Miguel.
sentences.cn: “你会下棋吗？”他斜睨着米格尔问道。

sentences.en: Bill is no match for his younger brother at chess.
sentences.cn: 比尔下棋不是他弟弟的对手.

sentences.en: Chess fans around the globe watched the match with breathless interest.
sentences.cn: 全世界的棋迷都屏息静观这场棋赛.

sentences.en: Chess has long been regarded as a measure of intellect.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋长久以来被认为是智慧的体现。

sentences.en: Gary Kasparov has retained his title as world chess champion.
sentences.cn: 加雷·卡斯帕罗夫卫冕了他国际象棋世界冠军的称号。

sentences.en: Great chess players have a reputation for being both eccentric and argumentative.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋大师们以性格怪异和好与人争辩而闻名。

sentences.en: He has developed a consuming passion for chess.
sentences.cn: 他对下棋产生了极为浓厚的兴趣。

sentences.en: His fingers itch at the sight of a game of chess.
One of the prisoners has carved a beautiful wooden chess set.
sentences.cn: 有个犯人刻了一副漂亮的木头象棋。

sentences.en: Playing ( at ) chess is no fun; let's go to play table tennis.
sentences.cn: 下棋没劲, 还是去打乒乓球 吧.

sentences.en: The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentences.cn: 下棋的走法不但多种多样, 而且错综复杂.

sentences.en: The two retired workers are playing at chess.
sentences.cn: 两个退休工人正在下棋.

sentences.en: There will be a chess competition next week.
sentences.cn: 下个星期有一场国际象棋比赛.

sentences.en: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.cn: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

sentences.en: You've had chess on the brain since you were little.
sentences.cn: 你从很小的时候就对下棋产生了浓厚兴趣。

trans.tran_en: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s  king (= most important piece )
